content: 4 x chain 2 corners sew in all ends and block square personally wet blocking is the only method i use soak your item in warm water for 30 mins roll excess water out between 2 towels pin to mats or on a blocking board and allow to dry this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2018
